metadata.name: Piss Christ (Original)
metadata.description: Piss Christ (Original) is a dynamic video NFT that runs on a yearly loop cycle. On the anniversaries of vandalism to the original work, the image will replicate the damage: May 18 (Senate Floor, Washington D.C., 1989); Oct 12 (National Gallery of Victoria, Melbourne, 1997) and April 17 (The Collection Lambert, Avignon, 2011)
